def is_remote_control_for_dvd(remote:item):
    # Determine whether a specific remote is for the DVD player
    symbol is_dvd_remote = exists dvd: item : is_dvd_player(dvd) and close(remote, dvd)
    return is_dvd_remote

def in_known_location(remote:item):
    # Function to determine if the remote is in a known location
    symbol in_known_location = exists room: item : (is_table(room) or is_couch(room) or is_tvstand(r
oom)) and inside(remote, room)
    return in_known_location

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)

        assert is_off(dvd_player) # Ensure the DVD player is currently off
        assert has_switch(remote_control) # Ensure the remote control has a switch
        
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control) # Move closer to the remote control
        achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player) # Ensure the DVD player and remote control are clo
se to each other
        
        observe(remote_control, "Check if its the correct remote control for the DVD player") 
        
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Use the remote to turn the DVD player on

def has_switch_and_power_on(remote:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control has a switch and if its turned on
    symbol has_switch=exists switch: item : has_switch(switch) and close(switch, remote)
    symbol is_power_on=is_on(remote)
    return has_switch and is_power_on

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote:item, dvd:item):
    body:
        # Check if the remote control can be used to turn on the DVD player
        if not has_switch_and_power_on(remote):
            achieve_once inhand(remote) # Hold remote briefly to operate it
            achieve is_on(remote)  # Turns on the remote control
        
        achieve is_on(dvd) # Ensure the DVD player is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and close_char(char, remote)
        # Bind to remote control
        
        bind dvd: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd) and close(remote, dvd)
        # Bind to DVD player

        use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote, dvd)

behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control) # Temporarily hold the remote control in hand
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player] == 2061
        # Select the DVD player with ID 2061

        use_remote_control(remote_control, dvd_player)
